overview: At home things are going haywire: wet nappies everywhere, the pacifier no longer calms you down, the baby food doesn't stay. where he belongs. Even a stroll through the city in a stroller brings no improvement. On the contrary: Dad has to change Kittie's dripping diapers in public. Before he completely throws the education away, he seeks advice from Lady Tabea. She is articulate and knows the tricks of adult babies. Bit by bit their consistent measures take effect, Kittie is successfully raised to a lovely adult baby. What does it mean for a young girl to live real regression? To be swaddled, brought up, mothered and fed day and night?
title: Baby Berlin
